page.title: 13HUMBIE VILLAGE HALL
page.content: IN HUMBIE WE HAVE A VILLAGE HALL WHICH IS USED BY DIFFERENT GROUPS.SEVERAL YEARS AGO THE VILLAGE HAD AN OLD HALL AND IT WAS DECIDED THAT A NEW ONE SHOULD BE BUILT.THE VILLAGERS HAD TO RAISE LOTS OF MONEY FOR THIS AND MANY FUND RAISING ACTIVITIES WERE HELD.THE NEW HALL WAS BUILT TWELVE YEARS AGO ON GROUND NEXT TO THE SCHOOL AND WHEN IT WAS FINISHED A SPECIAL CONCERT WAS HELD.EVERYBODY TOOK PART.OUR HALL IS USED REGULARLY AND WE DO GYM LESSONS THERE.IT IS VERY IMPORTANT THAT THERE IS A FACILITY LIKE THIS IN A SCATTERED COMMUNITY LIKE OURS.
